text.section:
This subtitle does not apply to:
a dealer or pawnbroker licensed under Title 12 of this article;
a person doing business other than junk business or scrap metal business whenever the person:
buys or transports junk or scrap metal used in the operation of the business; or
transports, for disposal or sale, junk or scrap metal accumulated by the business to dispose of or sell the junk or scrap metal; or
a vehicle that a common carrier uses to transport junk or scrap metal in the business of the common carrier.
Except as provided in § 17-1012 of this subtitle, this subtitle does not apply to antique dealers.
